name: Short Fuse
detailed_description:
Short fuse is a single player action dungeon game where you need to fend off all types of enemies with bombs and other types of explosives. Along this adventure, you will be able to shop for amazing new types of weaponry and all types of armor. With over 8 Types of Bombs and 6 sets of armor, you will have no problem defeating the evil that lives in the caverns of the dungeon!

Key Features

  • Over 8 types of Bombs that have special and different abilities to slay the enemies of this decrepit dungeon.
  • 12 types of Enemies to discover and battle on the field with their own special skills.
  • 6 sets of armor that give you amazing abilities.
  • chest rooms that give you lots of treasures.
  • a shop system that delivers you the best loot that one can get.
  • randomized rooms.
  • randomized enemy spawn so you never know who you're gonna get.
